categories: Category:Cut content from The Heart of the Jedi

nodes.text: Caladane was a male Human who served as the king of the planet Galvoni III during the Galactic Civil War. His father had once served as Galvoni's representative in the Senate of the Galactic Republic. In the aftermath of the Nagai–Tof War, Caladane's son Gowan helped Leia Organa negotiate peace between the Alliance of Free Planets and a regrouped Imperial Senate.
